solrVelocityScriptConfig.name: solrVelocity
solrVelocityScriptConfig.msg: Apache Solr 5.0.0到Apache Solr 8.3.1可以通过VelocityResponseWriter自定义响应渲染模块来执行远程代码
solrVelocityScriptConfig.subject: 使用Apache Solr 8.4以上的版本或是禁止使用VelocityResponseWriter，并对Apache Solr rest api管理访问进行必要的认证！

solrDataImportScriptConfig.name: solrDataImport
solrDataImportScriptConfig.msg: Apache Solr RCE via dataimport url source
solrDataImportScriptConfig.subject: please disable sorl dataimport functions

flinkScriptConfig.name: flink
flinkScriptConfig.msg: Apache Flink未授权上传jar包导致远程代码执行的漏洞
flinkScriptConfig.subject: Apache Flink禁止上传jar的rest api或是进行必要的认证

tomcatAjpScriptConfig.name: tomcatAJP
tomcatAjpScriptConfig.msg: 利用Apache Tomcate AJP 协议来下载任意文件
tomcatAjpScriptConfig.subject: 通过改变apache tomcat的配置方式，若非必要禁止使用AJP协议,或是通过防火墙禁止远程访问8009端口

ms17010ScriptConfig.name: ms17010
ms17010ScriptConfig.msg: MS17010永恒之蓝，通过SMBv1堆溢出来执行远程代码!
ms17010ScriptConfig.subject: 请打必要的补丁，关闭445端口访问

bluekeepScriptConfig.name: CVE-2019-0708
bluekeepScriptConfig.msg: BlueKeep (CVE-2019-0708) is a vulnerability in the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) that can affect the Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows XP, Server 2003 and Server 2008 operating systems!
bluekeepScriptConfig.subject: 请打相应的补丁，并禁止3389端口访问

scanYarnConfig.name: HadoopYarn
scanYarnConfig.msg: 通过hadoop yarn rest api 或是ipc api来远程创建yarn应用，从而执行任意恶意的远程代码
scanYarnConfig.subject: 请对rest api进行必要的认证，并更换ipc 的默认端口

scanRedisConfig.name: scanRedis
scanRedisConfig.subject: redis设置强密码，避免redis在root权限下运行

scanSparkConfig.name: scanSpark
scanSparkConfig.msg: spark无授权rest api，可以远程创建spark应用,从而执行任意恶意代码
scanSparkConfig.subject: 对spark rest api的访问进行必要的认证,并修改默认端口
scanSparkConfig.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/80.0.3987.163 Safari/537.36

weblogicCVE20202555Config.name: scanWeblogic
weblogicCVE20202555Config.msg: Vulnerability in the Oracle Coherence product of Oracle Fusion Middleware (component: Caching,CacheStore,Invocation).Supported versions that are affected are 3.7.1.17, 12.1.3.0.0, 12.2.1.3.0 and 12.2.1.4.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via T3 to compromise Oracle Coherence. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Oracle Coherence.Affected version: Oracle Coherence 3.7.1.17, 12.1.3.0.0, 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0
weblogicCVE20202555Config.subject: 打相关漏洞补丁,如无必要，禁止使用T3协议
